HERO_CONTENT: I'm Luis Santos, a dedicated Java FullStack Developer with extensive experience in the development of sophisticated and scalable web applications. Over the course of more than six years in the industry, I have refined my expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, including Angular 2+, Vue.js, React for the client side, and Java 8+, Spring Framework for server-side operations, complemented by proficiency in database management with MySQL, PostgreSQL.
ABOUT_TEXT: I am a committed Java FullStack Developer with over six years of experience in the development of scalable web applications. My technical expertise includes working with front-end frameworks like Angular, Vue.js, and React, alongside back-end development with Java and the Spring Framework. I am proficient in database management using MySQL and PostgreSQL. My professional journey includes significant contributions at Edgelab and Affinity, where I've focused on enhancing application functionality and user experience through strategic technology implementation.

EXPERIENCES.description: Led a team in developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with MongoDB databases. Collaborated with stakeholders to define project requirements and timelines.

Designed and developed user interfaces for web applications using Next.js and React. Worked closely with backend developers to integrate frontend components with Node.js APIs. Implemented responsive designs and optimized frontend performance.

Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for data communication. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products on schedule.

Contributed to the development of web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Managed databases and implemented data storage solutions using MongoDB. Worked closely with product managers to prioritize features and enhancements.

PROJECTS.title: E-Commerce Website
PROJECTS.description: A fully functional e-commerce website with features like product listing, shopping cart, and user authentication.

PROJECTS.title: Task Management App
PROJECTS.description: An application for managing tasks and projects, with features such as task creation, assignment, and progress tracking.

PROJECTS.title: Portfolio Website
PROJECTS.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.

PROJECTS.title: Blogging Platform
PROJECTS.description: A platform for creating and publishing blog posts, with features like rich text editing, commenting, and user profiles.
